name: and then he went to the tower
name_original: and then he went to the tower
description:
An entry for #bitsyjam June 2020 on the theme of "Cursed Book". Use the arrow keys to navigate and advance text.

A year ago a stranger passed through the village, and then everything changed. Is there a way to set things right? What even happened? Will you ever know?

Built in Bitsy by Adam Le Doux. The title card font is Le Murmure by Jérémy Landes.
